did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: Ralph B. Schwartz letters to his wife Gertrude Schwartz
did.abstract: These letters, written to his wife Gertrude Schwartz in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, between July 23 and September 8, 1943, talk about preparing for exams, other men in the ASTP program, contrast of life at Stanford to life at Army camp, visits to a veterans hospitality house in Palo Alto, trip to San Francisco, and his daily life.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: Ralph B. Schwartz was in the Army Specialized Training Program at Stanford University in the summer of 1943.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: These letters, written to his wife Gertrude Schwartz in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, between July 23 and September 8, 1943, talk about preparing for exams, other men in the ASTP program, contrast of life at Stanford to life at Army camp, visits to a veterans hospitality house in Palo Alto, trip to San Francisco, and his daily life.
